member.name: T:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParameterBinding
member.summary: Allows API methods to accept multiple parameters via a POST operation. If a method is marked with and supports HTTP POSTs, clients must pass a single object with a property for each parameter. Both JSON and standard query string posting is supported. The parameters can be of any type.

member.name: M:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParameterBinding.ExecuteBindingAsync(System.Web.Http.Metadata.ModelMetadataProvider,System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parses the parameter value from the request body.

member.name: M:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParameterBinding.ParseParametersFromBody(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Read parameters from the body into a collection.

member.name: M:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParameterBinding.CreateBindingForMarkedParameters(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpParameterDescriptor)
member.summary: Returns a object to use for the API method parameter specified. An object is only returned if the parameter's method is marked with , otherwise null is returned.
member.remarks: Call this method in Global.asax.cs in Application_Start before the call to GlobalConfiguration.Configure(WebApiConfig.Register): GlobalConfiguration.Configuration.ParameterBindingRules.Insert(0, MultiPostParameterBinding.CreateBindingForMarkedParameters);

member.name: T:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParametersAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute on API methods that need to support multiple POST parameters. See the comments in class for how to enable support for multiple POST parameters.

member.name: P:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParametersAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to support multiple POST parameters. This is true by default.

member.name: M:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParametersAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with set to true.

member.name: M:RThomaz.Web.ModelBinding.MultiPostParametersAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with set to the specified value.
